html:
2.17.19  11:38 pm   Will you ever make a video for "The Future Song?" 

     sure

2.17.19  11:36 pm   what size back catalogue are you thinking you'll need before you tour with a band?

     it doesn't really matter

2.17.19  10:33 pm   how are you so normal?

     i must have bumped my head

2.17.19  10:26 pm   hey what kind of toast is best, from an objective viewpoint

     toast has no objectivity. during the toasting process its objectivity is stripped away, and remains in the toaster

2.17.19  9:59 pm   The vocals in wfaoie sound CRISP as, did you get a new mic or something? Or just figure out a better processing method? or am I just imagining it?

     gradually accumulated experience

2.17.19  9:51 pm   was the particular voice style you used for "if someone tells you they live in greenland" a reference to anything?

     traditional television broadcast journalism

2.17.19  9:10 pm   What's the story behind (what) love is?

     6.30.11 12:53am

2.17.19  8:44 pm   whats up with https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GtwVQbUSasw

     that's the content that was speculated about in the previous video

2.17.19  8:35 pm   Why is "questions" spelled as "ueqstions"

     actually it's spelled questions. with the green letter being read first

2.17.19  8:29 pm   Will these new informational adventure videos affect how quickly you make new music?

     they are supposed to make me make music twice as fast, to acheive the same pace the music has been at before

2.17.19  8:11 pm   as you get more and more popularity, do you still like it when we tell you non-questions akin to "your music means so much to me it helped me get through a lot of shit" or is it a hassle here and there's another way you'd prefer to recieve thanks? i want to tell you what a positive and powerful impact your work has but i don't wanna accidentally be a pain in the ass in the process

     i'm still putting them all on my fridge. actually i've started putting some of them inside the fridge

2.17.19  7:55 pm   I make my own music, and recently, I've tried out doing the wrong things during the creative process. So far, I've found immediate success with originality. Does this mean I'm doing it right, or am I still doing it wrong?

     right

2.17.19  7:41 pm   what will happen when i get older?

     you will get better at understanding the weather

2.17.19  6:34 pm   Can you put I'm crazy/it's raining on itunes please

     yes

2.17.19  6:13 pm   would you ever upload "write a song on the count of 3", or "rabbit snakes", or in general, any of your older songs to itunes and subsequent music sites?

     yes

2.17.19  4:09 pm   im going on a date and im worried that i'll act too nervous , any tips?anxiety level's going through the roof rn

     try to pay attention to how nervous the other person is

2.17.19  3:49 pm   Where can I buy your songs?

     online

2.17.19  3:18 pm   what's the point in having a bank of ideas if you are just going to make and execute new ones on the fly?

     there would be no point if they were never used

2.17.19  2:07 pm   I really wanna just go for a walk with my thoughts, but there's bad ice on the sidewalks and i have a foot injury. can you suggest an alternative? 

     i recommend the qwerty button keyboard

2.17.19  1:17 pm   Advise for starting musicians?

     if you can't resist it then it's probably right for you

2.17.19  12:52 pm   Hows life im full of hippieness

     fair enough

2.17.19  12:39 pm   Did you know that if you put a pink object in pink water it will appear even more pink?!?

     i did not know that

2.17.19  12:22 pm   Why is this wdbsite so simplistic?

     why are other websites too complicated to even load properly

2.17.19  12:21 pm   do u ever get nostalgic about school

     no

2.17.19  11:04 am   Is the next video a song?

     it might be

2.17.19  10:59 am   Are apples tasty?

     i'd say they have a medium amount of taste

2.17.19  10:47 am   does life have a meaning

     yes, and more

2.17.19  10:45 am   what's your view on the imbalance of motivation and inspiration?

     if there is an imbalance, then you need better communication networks

2.17.19  10:45 am   how do i ask a stupid question without feeling stupid?

     get angry while asking it. it's impossible to feel stupid while you're angry. anger makes you smart

2.17.19  10:41 am   is the chorus of long long journey meant to be sung in one breath

     it would have to be a long long long breath

2.17.19  9:22 am   Can you name a couple of cool things you have learned through the questions page?

     balance and simplicity

2.17.19  7:48 am   Are you really ever going to make a video for eat bread feel sure?

     sure

      I remember you had plans to make it

2.17.19  7:13 am   What was the bad thing you did

     tried to do sky writing on an overcast day

2.17.19  6:19 am   Do you think AI will kill us all?

     no

2.17.19  5:03 am   is it bad that i'm angry that i'm uncomfortable with nudity because god i'm really angry that i feel so uncomfortable with nudity i just want to be able to see someone who's naked and be like "ok" and move on with life instead of it kind of smacking me in the face and leaving a sting for a LOT longer than it should
i hope that makes sense. am i weird for feeling this way

     "is it bad that i'm angry that i'm uncomfortable" have you considered you might be overthinking this

2.17.19  3:34 am   Who would win the fight between a mouse made out of kryptonite and a mousetrap made out of supermans?

     the writer

2.17.19  2:26 am   As of your most recent note (1:31:19) have you made it to the North Pole yet?

     in the context of that note there were no plans to go to the north pole

2.17.19  2:01 am   Tell me something I don't know.

     everything is normal

2.17.19  12:34 am   If someone asked you what music genre you do, what would you tell them?

     regular

2.17.19  12:15 am   i dont want to ask a question?

     fair enough

2.16.19  11:54 pm   Why make videos to your songs?

     i'll give you a hint, if i didn't i think it's unlikely you would have ever found them

2.16.19  11:27 pm   I just wanted to say thanks, do you feel like being thanked today?

     yes but do you? thanks

2.16.19  10:56 pm   are you SERIOUSLY planning to reply to all these questions coming from all over the world?

     no

     really how do you put up with this thing? it's really a grateful thing to a fan like me but to the artist wouldn't it be a burden??

     it's a phenomenal learning experience

2.16.19  9:29 pm   woukd you like a free boat

     a very small one maybe

2.16.19  9:13 pm   Any more interviews coming up? 

     yes

2.16.19  8:36 pm   How to cope with the physical pain of being alone

     start making a reality show about it, and see where it goes from there

2.16.19  8:29 pm   IM SO INSPIRED AND HOPEFUL AND EXCITED FOR MY FUTURE AND YOUR FUTURE AND THE WORLDS FUTURE AND ABSOLUTELY EVERYTHING !!!!!!!!!

     that's cool but watch out for the down swing on this

2.16.19  8:23 pm   how did you land jobs without resumes?

     i don't know but if i were hiring i would prefer someone just send me an email promising that they are the right person for the job. and then if i believe them i will talk to them a bit more and then maybe i can figure it out after talking to them, and if it's for a musical job then i would have them do an audition or something

2.16.19  8:04 pm   re: 11.15.16  11:46 am was your "movies are nice" video based on step 1?

     no

2.16.19  7:34 pm   Your opinion of musicals? 

     could use more music
